00013 PVFrameListener::PVFrameListener(RenderWindow* win, 
00014          Camera* cam, 
00015          SceneManager *sceneMgr, 
00016          std::map<std::string, PVNode*>& objectMap, 
00017          std::vector<PVNode*>& balls, 
00018          PVApplication *app)
00019 
00020 : ExampleFrameListener(win, cam, true, false), 
00021 m_objectMap(objectMap), 
00022 m_balls(balls), 
00023 m_app(app)
00024 {
00025  // key and mouse state tracking
00026  mMouseDownBool = false;
00027  mToggle = 0.0;
00028  mKeyboard->setEventCallback(this);
00029  
00030  // Populate the camera and scene manager containers
00031  mCamNode = cam->getParentSceneNode();
00032  mSceneMgr = sceneMgr;
00033  
00034  // set the rotation and move speed
00035  mRotate = 0.13;
00036  mMove = 250;
00037 
00038  mContinue = true;
00039  
00040  //m_timer = PVTimer::getInstance();
00041  m_physicsNode = new PVPhysics();
00042  
00043  it = m_objectMap.find("kanone");
00044  if( it != m_objectMap.end() )
00045  {
00046   kanone = it->second;
00047  }
00048  
00049  m_index = 0;
00050  
00051  m_shootingSpeedFactor = 4.0;
00052  
00053  lastT = 0;
00054  autoShoot = false;
00055 }
00056 
00057 bool PVFrameListener::frameStarted(const FrameEvent &evt)
00058 {
00059  mMouse->capture();
00060  
00061  bool currMouseBool = mMouse->getMouseState().buttonDown(OIS::MB_Left);
00062  mMouseDownBool = currMouseBool;
00063  
00064  m_physicsNode->simulate(m_objectMap, m_balls, m_index, evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00065  
00066  if (autoShoot) 
00067  {
00068   shootBallsAuto(evt.timeSinceLastFrame);
00069  }
00070  
00071  
00072  return mContinue;
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool PVFrameListener::keyPressed(const OIS::KeyEvent &arg)
00076 {
00077  switch(arg.key)
00078  {
00079   case OIS::KC_ESCAPE:
00080    mContinue = false;
00081    break;
00082   case OIS::KC_SPACE:
00083    shootBall();
00084    break;
00085   case OIS::KC_A:
00086    kanone->rotateNode(LEFT);
00087    break;
00088   case OIS::KC_D:
00089    kanone->rotateNode(RIGHT);
00090    break;
00091   case OIS::KC_W:
00092    kanone->rotateNode(UP);
00093    break;
00094   case OIS::KC_S:
00095    kanone->rotateNode(DOWN);
00096    break;
00097   case OIS::KC_O:
00098    mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(0.0f, 15, 45) );
00099    mCamera->lookAt(Vector3(0,0,-1));
00100    break;
00101   case OIS::KC_P:
00102    mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(0.0f, 60, 100) );
00103    mCamera->lookAt(Vector3(0,-0.3f,-1));
00104    break;
00105   case OIS::KC_I:
00106    mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(-100, 60, 50));
00107    mCamera->lookAt(1, -0.3f, 0);
00108    break;
00109   case OIS::KC_R:
00110    m_app->clearAllBalls();
00111    m_index = 0;
00112    break;
00113   case OIS::KC_UP:
00114    m_shootingSpeedFactor += 0.5;
00115    std::cout << m_shootingSpeedFactor << std::endl;
00116    break;
00117   case OIS::KC_DOWN:
00118    m_shootingSpeedFactor -= 0.5;
00119    std::cout << m_shootingSpeedFactor << std::endl;   
00120    break;
00121   case OIS::KC_1:
00122    m_app->m_numberOfBalls = 10;
00123    m_app->clearAllBalls();
00124    m_index = 0;
00125    break;
00126   case OIS::KC_2:
00127    m_app->m_numberOfBalls = 50;
00128    m_app->clearAllBalls();
00129    m_index = 0;
00130    break;
00131   case OIS::KC_3:
00132    m_app->m_numberOfBalls = 100;
00133    m_app->clearAllBalls();
00134    m_index = 0;
00135    break;
00136   case OIS::KC_4:
00137    m_app->m_numberOfBalls = 1000;
00138    m_app->clearAllBalls();
00139    m_index = 0;
00140    break;
00141   case OIS::KC_5:
00142    if (autoShoot) 
00143    {
00144     autoShoot = false;
00145     std::cout << "autoShoot off" << std::endl;
00146    }
00147    else
00148    {
00149     autoShoot = true;
00150     //kanone->setKanoneMaxLeft();
00151     std::cout << "autoShoot on" << std::endl;
00152    }
00153    break;   
00154  }
00155  return mContinue;
00156 }
00157 
00158 void PVFrameListener::shootBallsAuto(float t)
00159 {
00160  lastT += t;
00161  if(m_index < m_app->m_numberOfBalls - 1)
00162  {
00163   if (lastT > 0.2) 
00164   {
00165    m_balls[m_index]->setAcceleration( kanone->getOrientation() * Vector3(20.0, 20.0, 20.0) );
00166    m_balls[m_index]->setVelocity( kanone->getOrientation() * Vector3(10.0, 10.0, 10.0)* m_shootingSpeedFactor);
00167    std::cout << "Bälle: " << (m_index + 1) << std::endl; 
00168    ++m_index;
00169    lastT = 0;
00170    //kanone->rotateNode(RIGHT);
00171   }
00172   
00173  }
00174 
00175 }

00179  bool handled = true;
00180  
00181  return handled;
00182 }

00184 void PVFrameListener::shootBall()
00185 {
00186  if(m_index < m_app->m_numberOfBalls - 1)
00187  {
00188   m_balls[m_index]->setAcceleration( kanone->getOrientation() * Vector3(20.0, 20.0, 20.0) );
00189   m_balls[m_index]->setVelocity( kanone->getOrientation() * Vector3(10.0, 10.0, 10.0)* m_shootingSpeedFactor);
00190   std::cout << "Bälle: " << (m_index + 1) << std::endl; 
00191   ++m_index;
00192 
00193  }
00194 }

00199 PVApplication::PVApplication() : ExampleApplication(), m_numberOfBalls(10)
00200 {
00201 }

00203 PVApplication::~PVApplication()
00204 {
00205  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_balls.size(); ++i)
00206  {
00207   delete m_balls.at(i);
00208  }
00209 }
00210 void PVApplication::createCamera(void)
00211 {
00212  mCamera = mSceneMgr->createCamera("PlayerCam");
00213  mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(0, 60, 100));
00214  mCamera->lookAt(Vector3(0,0, 0));
00215  mCamera->setNearClipDistance(5);  
00216  
00217 }
00218 void PVApplication::createViewports(void)
00219 {
00220  Viewport* vp = mWindow->addViewport(mCamera);
00221  vp->setBackgroundColour(ColourValue(0,0,0));
00222  mCamera->setAspectRatio(Real(vp->getActualWidth()) / Real(vp->getActualHeight()));  
00223 }

00225 void PVApplication::createScene(void)
00226 {
00227  Light *light;
00228  
00229  light = mSceneMgr->createLight("Light1");
00230  light->setType( Light::LT_DIRECTIONAL);
00231  light->setDiffuseColour(0.01, 0.01, 0.35);
00232  light->setSpecularColour(0.01, 0.01, 0.35);
00233  light->setDirection(0, 0, -50);
00234  light->setPosition(Vector3(0,0,100));
00235  
00236  float intensity = 0.5f;
00237  light = mSceneMgr->createLight("Light2");
00238  light->setType( Light::LT_POINT);
00239  light->setPosition(Vector3(0,100,0));
00240  light->setDiffuseColour(intensity, intensity, intensity);
00241  light->setSpecularColour(intensity, intensity, intensity);
00242 
00243  mSceneMgr->setSkyBox(true, "Examples/SpaceSkyBox");
00244  
00245  // arena
00246  Entity* arenaEntity = mSceneMgr->createEntity( "ArenaEntity", "arena.mesh" );
00247  SceneNode* arenaNode = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode( "ArenaNode", Vector3(0.0f, 6.5f,  0.0f) );
00248  arenaNode->attachObject( arenaEntity );
00249  PVNode *arena = new PVNode("arena", arenaNode, arenaEntity);
00250  
00251  // goal wall
00252  Entity* wallEntity = mSceneMgr->createEntity( "TorwandEntity", "wall.mesh" );
00253  SceneNode* wallNode = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode( "TorwandNode", Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, -26.0f) );
00254  wallNode->attachObject( wallEntity );
00255  PVNode *wall = new PVNode("wall", wallNode, wallEntity);
00256  
00257  // pillar
00258  Entity* p1Entity = mSceneMgr->createEntity( "p1Entity", "pillar.mesh" );
00259  SceneNode* p1Node = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode( "p1Node", Vector3(26.0f, 14.6f, -12.0f) );
00260  p1Node->attachObject( p1Entity );
00261  PVNode *p1 = new PVNode("p1", p1Node, p1Entity );
00262  
00263  Entity* p2Entity = mSceneMgr->createEntity( "p2Entity", "pillar.mesh" );
00264  SceneNode* p2Node = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode( "p2Node", Vector3(-26.0f, 14.6f, -12.0f) );
00265  p2Node->attachObject( p2Entity );
00266  PVNode *p2 = new PVNode("p2", p2Node, p2Entity);
00267  
00268  // cannon
00269  Entity* kanoneEntity = mSceneMgr->createEntity( "KanoneEntity", "cannon.mesh" );
00270  SceneNode* kanoneNode = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode( "KanoneNode", Vector3(0.0f, 4.3f, 37.5f) );
00271  kanoneNode->attachObject( kanoneEntity );
00272  PVNode *kanone = new PVNode("kanone", kanoneNode, kanoneEntity);
00273  //kanoneNode->attachObject(mCamera);
00274  
00275  m_objectMap["wall"] = wall;
00276  m_objectMap["arena"] = arena;
00277  m_objectMap["kanone"] = kanone;
00278  m_objectMap["p1"] = p1;
00279  m_objectMap["p2"] = p2;
00280  
00281  createBalls();
00282 }

00284 void PVApplication::createFrameListener(void)
00285 {
00286  // Create the FrameListener
00287  mFrameListener = new PVFrameListener(mWindow, mCamera, mSceneMgr, m_objectMap, m_balls, this);
00288  mRoot->addFrameListener(mFrameListener);
00289  
00290  // infos links unten
00291  mFrameListener->showDebugOverlay(true);
00292 }
00293 
00294 void PVApplication::clearAllBalls()
00295 {
00296  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_balls.size(); ++i) {
00297   std::stringstream s;
00298   s << "SphereEntity " << i;// << number;
00299   mSceneMgr->destroyEntity(s.str());
00300   s << "node";
00301   mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()->removeAndDestroyChild(s.str());
00302  }
00303  m_balls.clear();
00304  createBalls();
00305  
00306 }
00307 
00308 void PVApplication::createBalls()
00309 {
00310  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_numberOfBalls; ++i) 
00311  {
00312   
00313   std::stringstream s;
00314   s << "SphereEntity " << i;// << number;
00315   Entity *sphereEntity = mSceneMgr->createEntity(s.str(), "sphere.mesh"); 
00316   s << "node";
00317   SceneNode *sphereNode = mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()->createChildSceneNode(s.str());
00318   sphereNode->attachObject( sphereEntity );
00319   sphereNode->scale(Vector3(0.02,0.02,0.02));
00320   PVNode *ball = new PVNode("sphere", sphereNode, sphereEntity);
00321 
00322   std::map<std::string, PVNode*>::iterator itCannon = m_objectMap.find("kanone");
00323 
00324   ball->translateNode(itCannon->second->getPosition());
00325   
00326   m_balls.push_back(ball);
00327  }
00328 }

00331 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00332 {

00334     PVApplication app;
00335  
00336     try {
00337         app.go();
00338     } catch( Exception& e ) {
